page.title: 13FAVOURITE T.V.PROGRAMMES
page.content: Most of the children spend much of their free time watching television. The most unpopular programme was the news because either the children did not understand politics or the programme was always about people being hurt and showing frightening pictures. The favourite programmes were cartoons mainly because the characters were easy to draw. Top of the list included space adventures, Blue Peter, Top of the Pops, police/detective stories and programmes for family entertainment. Quiz shows were not popular because the children found the questions too hard to answer. The Radio was only used for listening to pop music during the day. 60% of the children had their own television in their bedrooms which they watched in bed at night.
